Sentence (Southern Ndebele): Ngizoya edolobheni to buy some groceries.
Kufanele senze izinto quickly and efficiently.
Ngihamba eGoli, kodwa I will be back soon.
Akumnandi ukuyohlala khona, it's very cold.
That was a good idea, kodwa ngiyesaba.
Uzofika nini ekhaya, or will you stay out?
Kumele sigcine isivumelwano sethu silandela umthetho.
Ubani igama lakho? - Igama lami nguSipho.
Ngabe sekusondele isikhathi sokuhamba? - Yebo, siyahamba manje.
Ungakuchaza kangcono lokhu? - Impela, lokhu kusho ukuthi...
Kutheni ulapha namhlanje? - Ngize ukuzobona umngani wami.
Uthanda ini ukudla? - Ngithanda inyama yenkukhu.
Sihlala kuphi namhlanje ebusuku? - Sihlala esihhotela.
I-University of Johannesburg ingesinye sezikhungo ezinkulu.
UNelson Mandela waba ngumongameli wokuqala wentando yeningi.
